item.title: SingleCellTools
item.description: Selected tools for single-cell and spatial transcriptomics. scRNA-seq ALRA: Zero-preserving imputation HotSpot: identifies informative gene modules (pip install hotspotsc==0.9.1) SCENIC/pySCENIC: Single-cell regulatory network and clustering PROGENy & decoupleR: inference of pathway activities (human & mouse) MetaNeighbor: characterizing the replicability of cell types across datasets (R) SAMap: mapping cell atlas manifolds across species (py) MAGIC: imputing missing values and restoring the structure of single-cell data (R & py) SCTK: Single Cell ToolKit spatial transcriptomics Toolkits Giotto: toolbox for integrative analysis of spatial data (datasets) (GittoSuite) Spateo: Spatiotemporal modeling of spatial transcriptomics (turorial) Stereopy: spatial transcriptomics analysis in python stLearn: downstream analysis toolkit for Spatial Transcriptomic data scvi-tools: probabilistic modeling of single-cell omics data Spatial data imputation gimVI: Imputing missing genes in spatial data from scRNA-seq using a deep generative model stPlus: reference-based method for the accurate enhancement of spatial transcriptomics Spatial variable genes SpatialDE: identification of spatially variable genes (py) Spark: Statistical analysis of spatial expression patterns SpaGCN: spatial domains and SVGs by graph convolutional network Spatial clustering BayesSpace: Clustering and Resolution Enhancement of Spatial Transcriptomes SpaGCN DSSC: Deep Spatially constrained Single-cell Clustering (using spatial information and marker genes) Bansky: incorporating neighborhood information for clustering spatial transcriptomic data (R & Bansky_py) (tutorial) SEDR: Unsupervised Spatial Embedded Deep Representation of Spatial Transcriptomics DeepST: (there are 2 tools called DeepST; one is from the SEDR lab: tutorial and second one) STAGATE: Deciphering spatial domains with an adaptive graph attention auto-encoder Deconvolution RCTD: Robust Cell Type Decomposition Differential expression C-SIDE: Cell type-specific inference of differential expression (spacexr = RCTD + C-SIDE; Vignettes) Giotto-Gini Cell-cell interactions GCNG: GCN for inferring cell-cell interactions SpaOTsc: spatial optimal transport for SC data (py) CellChat: Inference and analysis of cell-cell communication [http://www.
